meanings.sent1: Lack of sleep debilitates my energy levels.
meanings.sent2: The illness debilitates her ability to walk long distances.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy debilitates my self-control.
meanings.sent4: The constant stress debilitates his mental resilience.
meanings.sent5: Running a marathon without training debilitates the muscles.

meanings.sent1: Heavy traffic debilitates our progress on the road.
meanings.sent2: The storm debilitates the construction work on the building.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting my keys debilitates my morning routine.
meanings.sent4: The lack of funds debilitates the completion of the project.
meanings.sent5: The broken elevator debilitates access to the upper floors.
